data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes on some species and subspecies of aphids (Hemiptera: Aphididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stekolshchikov, Andrey V. (2014): Taxonomic notes on some species and subspecies of aphids (Hemiptera: Aphididae). Zootaxa 3760 (4): 563-570, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3760.4.5
